com.thunken.numanuma

Class EnumCollectors

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thunken.numanuma.EnumCollectors

  • public class EnumCollectors
extends Object
    Implementations of Collector that implement various useful reduction operations for enumerated types, such as accumulating elements into an EnumSet and other bit vectors.
    See Also:
    EnumSets

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      EnumCollectors()

      Returns a Collector that accumulates the input elements into a new BitSet.

    • Method Detail

      • toBitFlag

        public static <E extends Enum<E>> Collector<E,?,Integer> toBitFlag()
        Returns a Collector that accumulates the input elements into a new int-based bit flag.
        Type Parameters:
        E - The type of the elements to collect.
        Returns:
        A Collector which collects all the input elements into a new int-based bit flag.

      • toBitSet

        public static <E extends Enum<E>> Collector<E,?,BitSet> toBitSet()
        Returns a Collector that accumulates the input elements into a new BitSet.
        Type Parameters:
        E - The type of the elements to collect.
        Returns:
        A Collector which collects all the input elements into a BitSet.

      • toEnumSet

        public static <E extends Enum<E>> Collector<E,?,EnumSet<E>> toEnumSet(@NonNull
                                                                      Class<E> elementType)
        Returns a Collector that accumulates the input elements into a new EnumSet.
        Type Parameters:
        E - The type of the elements to collect.
        Parameters:
        elementType - The class object of the element type for the specified Enum.
        Returns:
        A Collector which collects all the input elements into a new EnumSet.
